message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a unique asset that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $2000000.
I'm interested in the product, but $2000000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to offer $1200000 for it.
I understand that $1200000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $1800000. This is the highest price I'm willing to go, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1800000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to offer $1500000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $1800000, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer it to you for $1700000. This is my final compromise, so I hope we can agree on a price.
